    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest(java.lang.String reqType,
                   java.lang.String reqUrl,
                   java.lang.String rawUrl,
                   java.lang.String version,
                   java.lang.String ipaddr,
                   java.util.HashMap headerMap,
                   java.util.HashMap originalHeaderMap,
                   java.util.HashMap paramMap,
                   byte[] bodyContent,
                   int notificationtype,
                   HttpStream stream,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String scheme,
                   java.lang.String engineName)
            throws java.io.IOException
        To initialize a http request
        Parameters:
        reqType - - type of http request such as GET,POST,etc.
        reqUrl - - request url of the http request
        version - - http version. Ex HTTP/1.0
        ipaddr - - ip address to which the connection is made
        headerMap - - list of headers in the request
        paramMap - - list of request parameters
        bodyContent - - request content
        notificationtype - - state of the request Ex: StateConstants.ON_COMPLETE
        stream - - httpstream of the request to get digest data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getState

        public int getState()
        To get the request status
        Returns:
        - Integer representing the state of the request Note: List of Possible values 1. StateConstants.REQUEST_IN_PROCESS = 1 2. StateConstants.REQUEST_ACKNOWLEDGED = 2 3. StateConstants.ON_HEADER_COMPLETION = 10 4. StateConstants.ON_DATA = 11 5. StateConstants.ON_COMPLETION = 12 6. StateConstants.ON_OUTPUTBUFFERREFILL = 13 7. StateConstants.ON_WRITECOMPLETE = 14 8. StateConstants.ON_WRITEFAILURE = 15

        public java.util.Hashtable getAuthDetails()
